sentences.sContent: She spent her childhood as the pampered daughter of a wealthy family.
sentences.sCn: 她出身于一个富裕家庭，从小娇生惯养。

synos.tran: 纵容；使…过量；给…吃得过多

trans.tranCn: 纵容， 娇惯； 精心护理
trans.tranOther: to look after someone very kindly, for example by giving them the things that they want and making them feel warm and comfortable
